mapper.select: SELECT r.reservations_id, r.checkin, r.checkout, r.created_at, r.modified_at, r.status, r.reservation_price, r.reservation_name FROM RESERVATIONS r JOIN ROOMS ro ON r.room_id = ro.room_id JOIN HANOKS h ON ro.hanok_id = h.hanok_id WHERE h.owner_id = #{owner_id} AND r.checkout >= NOW()
SELECT COUNT(r.reservations_id) FROM RESERVATIONS r JOIN ROOMS ro ON r.room_id = ro.room_id JOIN HANOKS h ON ro.hanok_id = h.hanok_id WHERE h.owner_id = #{owner_id}
SELECT SUM(r.reservation_price) FROM RESERVATIONS r JOIN ROOMS ro ON r.room_id = ro.room_id JOIN HANOKS h ON ro.hanok_id = h.hanok_id WHERE h.owner_id = #{owner_id}
SELECT COUNT(rv.review_id) AS review_count FROM HANOKS h JOIN ROOMS r ON h.hanok_id = r.hanok_id LEFT JOIN REVIEWS rv ON r.room_id = rv.room_id WHERE h.owner_id = #{owner_id}
